page.title: 07Life in Littlebeck. P2
page.content:
there is a game farm; a wood carving centre; a village hall; and a Methodist chapel.
Electricity and telephones are frequently out of action in{winter}and children reach schools in Whitby or Sleights by landrover.No bus calls.
In{summer}the narrow roads are sometimes jammed with tourist traffic. Television arrived only recently.The Rose Queen Festival is in August.
Crime is not a problem.The{Village {Hall}hosts whist drives,a play group and badminton. The Mobile Library visits once a fortnight.
